title: How to Delete Text Messages on Android

steps.title: Find the Messages icon on your Apps menu, and tap it to open your inbox.
steps.content: Find the Messages icon on your Apps menu, and tap it to open your inbox. If the Messages app opens up to a conversation, tap on the top-left to go back to your inbox.

steps.title: This selects the message and allows you to edit it.
steps.content: This selects the message and allows you to edit it. If you'd rather select multiple messages to delete at once, long-press the first message to select it, and then tap every message you want to add.

steps.title: The DELETE button is at the upper-right corner of the screen.
steps.content: The DELETE button is at the upper-right corner of the screen. This deletes the message from your inbox. On some versions, you might see a trash icon here instead of a DELETE button. In this case, tap the trash icon to delete. You may have to tap DELETE a second time to confirm.
